about.details:
Incorporated in 1994, Auro Impex & Chemicals Limited is an Auro Group Company.

Auro Impex & Chemicals is engaged in manufacturing, exporting, and supply of Discharge & Collecting Electrodes, and Electrostatic Precipitator (ESP) internal parts and spares.

The company manufactures Collecting Electrodes of all profiles, Discharge Electrodes, Electromagnetic rapper, Tank Fabrication and Duct Fabrication, and other ESP Internal spare parts, for Original Equipment manufacturers (OEMs) and service providers ranging from sourcing of components, designing, manufacturing, quality testing as per the specifications provided by OEMs and service providers.

Auro Impex & Chemicals has been selling its products through renowned OEMs and Service Providers such as Thermax Limited, Larsen & Toubro Limited, KC Cottrell India Private Limited, Isgec Heavy Engineering Limited, Hariaksh Industries Private Limited, Par Techno-Heat Pvt Ltd, Filter Flow Engineering Private Limited, Imeco Overseas Private Limited and other Brand owners.

faqs.question: What is the Auro Impex & Chemicals IPO?
faqs.answer:
Auro Impex & Chemicals IPO is a SME IPO of 3470400 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹27.07 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹78 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on May 11, 2023, and closes on May 15, 2023.

Cameo Corporate Services Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Auro Impex & Chemicals IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Auro Impex & Chemicals IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Auro Impex & Chemicals IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Auro Impex & Chemicals IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Auro Impex & Chemicals IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Auro Impex & Chemicals IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Auro Impex & Chemicals IPO opens on May 11, 2023 and closes on May 15, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Auro Impex & Chemicals IPO?
faqs.answer: Auro Impex & Chemicals IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,24,800.

faqs.question: How to apply for Auro Impex & Chemicals IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Auro Impex & Chemicals IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Auro Impex & Chemicals IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Auro Impex & Chemicals IPO will be done on Thursday, May 18, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, May 22, 2023. Check the Auro Impex & Chemicals IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Auro Impex & Chemicals IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Auro Impex & Chemicals IPO listing date is on Tuesday, May 23, 2023.
